name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Skilled Frontend Developer with extensive expertise in **React 17+**, **Next.js**, **TypeScript 4**, and modern frontend technologies such as **Redux**, **React Query**, **Webpack 5+**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **Tailwind**. Proven ability to create responsive and user-friendly interfaces while integrating APIs and employing techniques like **API Mocking**. Combining a solid foundation in design tools such as **Figma**, **Sketch**, and **Invision** with a commitment to clean and efficient code. A strong communicator and mentor, dedicated to problem-solving and fostering a collaborative development environment. Recognized for delivering innovative solutions that drive user engagement across diverse sectors, including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed interactive web applications using **React 17+**, integrating **Next.js** for improved server-side rendering, enhancing performance and SEO by **25%**.
Collaborated on component design using **TypeScript 4** and **Redux**, ensuring type safety and state management efficiency, leading to reduced bugs by **30%**.
Implemented **React Query** for data fetching and state synchronization, decreasing loading times for API calls by **50%**.
Styled UI components using **Tailwind** and **CSS3**, ensuring responsive design and improved user experience with an aesthetic appeal that increased user engagement by **15%**.
Created static and dynamic layouts utilizing **Flexbox** and **Grid Layouts**, enhancing layout adaptability across mobile and desktop devices.
Conducted API integration and mocking to streamline testing processes while maintaining compatibility with backend services, contributing to a more robust application architecture.
Collaborated with designers using tools like **Figma**, **Sketch**, and **Invision** to ensure alignment between design and functionality, improving team workflow and project clarity.
Established CI/CD pipelines, enhancing deployment efficiency and reducing integration issues by **40%**.
Mentored junior developers by guiding them in coding practices and problem-solving strategies, fostering a collaborative team environment.

• Developed responsive user interfaces using **React 17+**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript 4**, enhancing user interactions and experiences.
• Implemented state management with **Redux** and **React Query** to maintain application consistency, optimizing performance by 30%.
• Utilized **Webpack 5+** for advanced bundling and minimizing build times, achieving a 40% reduction.
• Employed design frameworks like **Tailwind** and **Bootstrap** to create aesthetically pleasing layouts, ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
• Integrated APIs and conducted API mocking for development efficiency, resulting in a 25% faster feature rollout.
• Collaborated with design teams using tools like **Figma**, **Sketch**, and **Invision** to elevate the UI/UX quality, improving user satisfaction scores by 15%.
• Automated the deployment process using CI/CD strategies aligned with **Jenkins** for smoother transitions and version control.
• Applied PWA strategies to enhance application accessibility and offline functionality, increasing user retention by 10%.

- Developed responsive web applications using **React 17+**, resulting in a 40% increase in performance and user engagement.
- Implemented effective state management using **Redux** and asynchronous data fetching with **React Query** to enhance application efficiency and user experience.
- Utilized **Next.js** for server-side rendering, improving SEO performance by 30%.
- Conducted API integration and mocking to streamline frontend development, with a focus on seamless user interactions.
- Collaborated with design teams using tools such as **Figma**, **Sketch**, and **Invision** to implement pixel-perfect UI, ensuring adherence to **CSS3**, **Flexbox**, and **Grid Layouts** principles.
- Enhanced development workflows using **Webpack 5+** for efficient module bundling and asset optimization.
- Applied **CI/CD** practices to automate deployment processes, reducing deployment time by 50%.
- Mentored junior developers in best practices and problem-solving techniques to foster team growth and skill enhancement.

skills:
Programming Languages:
	Java, JavaScript (React 17+, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript 4, Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin)

**Backend Frameworks:**
	Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

**Frontend Frameworks:**
	React (17+), Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack (5+), Babel, Jest, HTML5, CSS, Tailwind, Bootstrap, CSS3, Flexbox, Grid Layouts

**API Technologies:**
	API integration, API Mocking, RESTful API design

**Serverless and Cloud Functions:**
	AWS Lambda

**Databases:**
	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

**DevOps:**
	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, CI/CD

**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

**Other:**
	Microservices, PWA, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, problem-solving, communication, mentoring, Figma, Sketch, Invision, Adobe stack, Builder.io, Magento, AEM
